General.Name: Satellos Bioscience Inc
General.Description: Satellos Bioscience Inc., a biotechnology company, develops regenerative therapeutics to treat degenerative muscle diseases. Its lead program focuses on the discovery and development of a small molecule drug for the treatment of duchenne. The company's MyoReGenX, an automated microscopy system which recapitulates the muscle stem cell environment ex-vivo. Satellos Bioscience Inc. was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 65 Front Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5E 1B5
